title: Single Room in Three Bedroom Fishtown House ~ Big Backyard!
description:
We have an open room in our Fishtown house, it's a three bedroom house with two other people living there. They've both been there for over 5 years - so ideally we'd like someone looking for a long term living situation.
The room itself is on the second floor and is a good size, fits a queen bed with plenty of space for a desk and tons of storage. It has 3 windows, with one facing West towards the sun. The room has a nice little closet to stash your clothes (has a bar for hangers and a top shelf area).
There's a double lot backyard, so it runs very deep and is great for parties/backyard BBQs! We have a gas and charcoal grill, a cement patio, tables/chairs, and a cool little fire pit.
There's one shared bathroom, but this has never been an issue sharing (especially since one of the housemates is rarely ever there). We've had both guys and girls rent here before, no preference on gender (or lack thereof.)
Mail Delivery: Side alley allows for packages to be easily and safely dropped off when no one is home (UPS and USPS have been doing this for years already).
Utilities: ~$70-80 (varies by month and usage, highest is around $120 in the winter if running the heat high). We have Verizon internet, but are also wired for Comcast - we switch between both every couple years to get the best rate. The house has gas heat (PGW) and no central air (we all use window units.)
Basement: Good for storage and nothing else.
It's a ~12 minute walk to the Girard El stop and on a very safe, friendly block. There's currently one cat in the house, she's super cool and has lived with other housemate's dogs/cats in the past. Super close to 95
-----------------------------------------------------
NEXT STEP: Send us a little info about you and we can chat to schedule a tour if it seems like a good fit. Expect to meet the other housemates and chat with them, we want to make sure everyone is happy so it works long term.
*Room is for a single person only, no couples please*

While the square footage may be modest, this well-maintained home lacks nothing in amenities.

title: Character rich 3 bed 2 bath Fitler Sq home has it all!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available August 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.

title: ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT! CHEAP RENT! GREAT VIEW!
description:
THE APARTMENT HASN’T BEEN RENTED IF THIS POST IS STILL UP.
READY TO SHOW NOW.  Prefer one day’s notice.  Minimum 12 month lease.  This is a perfect one bedroom apartment on the 11th floor of Walnut Square Apartments located at 13th and Walnut. It overlooks Walnut Street. This is one of the most happening areas in all of Philadelphia. Great stores, restaurants, and Bars everywhere. In walking distance to everything one could need. 3 blocks from Jefferson. I’ve lived here for 3 1/2 years but I am moving because of work, and am looking for someone else to take my apartment. The landlord told me I had to find someone to take on a 12 month lease to get out of my own lease. Stainless steel kitchen appliances. Bathroom with shower/tub. Bedroom, and living room. 3 closets, 4 total windows in the apartment. Two large windows facing Walnut St.. Carpet in the bedroom and wooden floors in the living room, hallway, and kitchen. Security on the main floor at night. Great Management. “Brand new Microwave is on order”, per maintenance . (The handle is partially broken.) Shared laundry room on every floor, with awesome BRAND NEW washer and drier, and a very convenient pay-with-phone app that lets you know when the cycle is done. You pay for electric only. The pictures of the apartment empty are from before I moved in.
Will only text if it is to set up a viewing of the apartment.  All other correspondence will be by email.  I respond to EVERYONE as soon as I see your email.  Let me know if you have any questions.  Thanks very much
